reference.title: Link-relationship attribute group
reference.shortdesc: The link relationship attribute group includes attributes whose values can be used for representing navigational relationships. These attributes occur only on elements that represent relationships among DITA elements or between DITA elements and non-DITA resources.

dlentry.dd: The format attribute identifies the format of the resource being referenced. See for details on supported values.
Provides a reference to a resource. See for detailed information on supported values and processing implications..

The scope attribute identifies the closeness of the relationship between the current document and the target resource. Allowable values are local, peer, external, and -dita-use-conref-target; see for more information on these values.
Describes the target of a reference. See for detailed information on supported values and processing implications.
